channel.title: Google Analytics on My Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Google Analytics on My Reflections

item.title: Extract Google Analytics data using Reporting API - Part 1
item.description: This is a two part tutorial to teach how you can extract google analytics data using Reporting API. In the first part, we will be covering some prerequisite setup which will allow us to leverage Reporting API. Create a new project by logging into your google API console Click on Credentials under side menu, select CONFIGURE CONSENT SCREEN Under User Type select External While configuring OAuth consent screen, you just need to profide Application name and support email.
